Module fi.tuni.roadwatch
Package fi.tuni.roadwatch

Class RoadAPILogic

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.roadwatch.RoadAPILogic
public class RoadAPILogic extends Object
Creates the data classes from digitraffic API and returns them to SessionData
